snippet: A week after Pope Benedict XVI formally retired, cardinals gathered in Rome to choose his successor went into a fourth day of soundings and deliberations on Thursday.

byline.original: By RACHEL DONADIO and ALAN COWELL
byline.contributor: Rachel Donadio reported from Vatican City, and Alan Cowell from London.

lead_paragraph: A week after Pope Benedict XVI formally retired, cardinals gathered in Rome to choose his successor went into a fourth day of soundings and deliberations on Thursday.

headline.seo: Cardinals Hold 4th Day of Talks on New Pope
headline.main: Cardinals Hold 4th Day of Talks on New Pope
headline.print_headline: Cardinals Hold 4th Day of Talks on New Pope
